wikipedia_page.main:
John Bowyer (18 June 1790 – 3 February 1880) was an English professional cricketer.
He was mainly associated with Surrey and he made 18 known appearances in first-class matches from 1810 to 1828.

response: :All-England: Thomas Flavel, John Bowyer, James Saunders, William Barber, Tom Marsden, Fuller Pilch, George Dawson, Thomas Beagley, William Mathews, George Jarvis, Henry Jupp
